heading: Today
text: Mostly cloudy, some breaks of sun far north. A chance of a few localized, passing showers, especially in the afternoon in southern areas. Highs in the upper 60s to mid 70s, warmest north. Light north winds, mainly less than 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Becoming mostly cloudy, with a few local evening showers south. A rising chance of showers south to north after midnight. Lows in the 50s, a few upper 40s northeast. Winds light, becoming southeast near 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Thursday
text: Clouds thickening and lowering, as showers become numerous, spreading southwest to northeast. Highs in the 60s to low 70s. Winds becoming southeast 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.
